name: Cats, OR Zach and the Hero Boys
name_original: Cats, OR Zach and the Hero Boys
description:
Hi I have made you guys a new game, it is called CATS, OR ZACH AND THE HERO BOYS!! In it Cats the Movie has caused a worldwide cataclysm, causing it to be saved by four heroes: ZACH, ALBERT, THE THIRD GUY, and CRAISE, the evil one!! Can YOU help them SAVE THE WORLD??

Well in this version you can't, because it's just a demo. But someday you'll get to play the full version featuring:

--MULTIPLE ENDINGS!!

--SIDEQUESTS

--MONEY SYSTEM

AND MORE!!!!

Note the folder name is Mercs for Hire, that is because at first I wanted to make a game about mercenaries but scrapped it.

(Contains graphics by White Screw Shop and music by MaouDamashii. Please download the RPG Maker 2003 RTP from here before playing.)
